backend/main.mo: Canister actor implementing access control, user approval, profile management, and blocklist functionality using mixins and Map storage.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report mapping feature requests to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of prewritten summaries describing functionality of various frontend source files.
frontend/DEPLOY_RETRY_RUNBOOK.md: Runbook explaining how to retry deployments, monitor results, and handle common infrastructure issues.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and global base styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entrypoint mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component handling session flow, user blocking checks, and routing between login, registration, admin, and user views.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Action: Reusable gradient action tile component with size variants for admin, user, and small modes.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/dashbo: Shared Tailwind class constants defining consistent borders, padding, and styling for dashboard UI elements.
frontend/src/components/feedback/Confirm: A customizable confirmation dialog using AlertDialog components with confirm and cancel handlers.
A wrapper around the sonner toast API providing success, error, and info notification helpers.
Main application shell with header, branding, scroll effects, navigation buttons, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/BottomShe: A bottom sheet modal component that locks body scroll and supports closing via backdrop or button.
frontend/src/components/layout/Dashboard: A footer with three configurable action buttons styled for dashboard navigation.
A layout wrapper that centers and constrains content within a framed dashboard container.
frontend/src/components/layout/PopupModa: A fullscreen modal with backdrop, close button, scrollable content, and body scroll locking.
frontend/src/features/admin/AdminPanel.t: Main admin panel controller that switches between admin views and handles MT-Loan prompt display.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/A: Bottom navigation bar for admin views with icons and active-state styling.
Grid of admin action tiles that navigate to various admin sections with customizable labels.
Displays the admin avatar with priority-based image loading and updates on profile or storage changes.
Provides the main admin layout with a dynamic header, navigation handling, and logout control.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/a: Defines admin view types and the navigation items with labels and icons.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/A: Shows income, expense, and due summary cards by reading account data from storage.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/App: Manages pending user approval requests with approve/reject actions stored in local storage.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Blo: Fetches approved users and allows blocking or unblocking them through backend actor calls.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Com: Handles adding, listing, and deleting company payment reports and shows total earned vs paid.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Fin: Loads workers and account data from storage and displays each workerâ€™s bill, cost, and final balance in a table.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Nas: Manages snack expense entries by splitting amounts among selected workers, updating histories and individual accounts, and allowing deletion.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Pay: Handles payment or loan entries, splitting amounts per worker, storing history, updating accounts, and supporting deletion.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Pro: Records production output per worker with rates and quantities, saves entries to history, and allows deletion without affecting accounts.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Set: Wrapper component that renders the system settings panel.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Sys: Provides UI for managing labels, layout rules, branding, custom sections, MT loan settings, user sharing, and admin profile photo.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Use: Displays user approval and blocking sections together.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Wor: Manages worker rate settings including add, delete, lock, update rates, and selection persistence.
Creates work entries using worker-specific rates to compute totals, stores history, validates rates, and supports deletion.
frontend/src/features/auth/BlockedAccoun: Displays a blocked account notice with logout option.
frontend/src/features/auth/LoginView.tsx: Provides a login form with branding, validation, and session login handling.
Handles user registration with validation, pending request storage, and confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/features/mt-loan/MtLoanPass: Prompts for MT Loan password, validates it, and authorizes access with identity setup.
frontend/src/features/mt-loan/UserPanelL: Placeholder component for a future user panel layout; currently returns null.
frontend/src/features/support/SupportVie: Implements admin and user support messaging with threads, message sending, and thread selection.
frontend/src/features/user/components/Cl: Displays a live-updating digital clock and formatted date.
frontend/src/features/user/components/Se: Bottom-sheet report summarizing selected workers and calculating total work, cost, and due amounts.
frontend/src/features/user/components/Us: Shows KPI summary cards for total due, total work, and total cost using themed styles.
frontend/src/features/user/payment/Nasta: Loads and displays per-user nasta expense history with totals and back navigation.
frontend/src/features/user/payment/Payme: Shows filtered loan/payment history for the user, computing per-head totals.
frontend/src/features/user/production/pr: Aggregates normalized production history by worker, summing double, single, and earnings totals.
frontend/src/features/user/production/Pr: Displays production history with summary totals and a detailed table sorted by timestamp.
frontend/src/features/user/production/wo: Normalizes worker name fields, returning available name arrays or a fallback value.
frontend/src/features/user/profile/Profi: React view for profile settings that handles password changes and displays user/branding info.
frontend/src/features/user/UserDashboard: Main user dashboard managing view modes, loading KPI data from storage, and routing to history and settings views.
frontend/src/features/user/work/WorkEntr: Displays a modal with detailed info for a single work entry, including the user's amount.
frontend/src/features/user/work/WorkHist: Loads and shows a user-filtered work history table with totals and detail view actions.
frontend/src/features/work/workAmount.ts: Computes per-user and group totals for work entries using multiple data formats and rate fallbacks.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useBranding.ts: Provides branding settings with live update handling and an update helper.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboardOverrides: Loads dashboard overrides and updates state when override change events fire.
frontend/src/hooks/useHashRoute.ts: Manages navigation using window.location.hash with state syncing and helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useSingleConfirmSubmi: Manages a single-confirm submit flow with duplicate-submit protection.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserNotice.ts: React hook that loads notice config from storage and updates state when a custom event fires.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, dark mode styles, gradients, and utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/branding/brandingStorag: Manages branding settings in localStorage and exposes helpers for retrieving branding and logo URLs.
frontend/src/lib/storage/adminCredential: Stores, loads, validates, and updates admin username/password using safe storage helpers.
frontend/src/lib/storage/adminDashboardL: Handles saving, loading, updating, and deleting admin dashboard layout rules in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/storage/adminSelectedWo: Manages a saved list of selected workers with helpers for toggling, checking, and cleaning selections.
frontend/src/lib/storage/adminTotalsStor: Simple load/save utilities for admin totals (taken, work, due) persisted in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/storage/backupRestore.t: Exports selected app data to a JSON backup and restores data from uploaded backup files.
frontend/src/lib/storage/companyReportSt: Stores and manages company payment reports, normalizes legacy data, and calculates total work earned.
frontend/src/lib/storage/customSectionsS: Loads and saves custom dashboard section definitions with size and placement options.
frontend/src/lib/storage/dashboardOverri: Manages configurable dashboard label overrides and notifies listeners when updates occur.
frontend/src/lib/storage/labelSettingsSt: Loads, merges, updates, and saves customizable label entries with ordering support.
frontend/src/lib/storage/mtLoanAuthStora: Handles session-based authorization flag for MT Loan features.
frontend/src/lib/storage/mtLoanIdentityS: Stores, retrieves, and clears a simple MT Loan identity record using safe storage functions.
frontend/src/lib/storage/mtLoanSettingsS: Manages loan settings in localStorage, including loading, saving, and validating passwords.
frontend/src/lib/storage/noticeStorage.t: Handles loading and saving user dashboard notice configuration with localStorage and emits update events.
frontend/src/lib/storage/productionHisto: Loads, normalizes, and saves production history entries ensuring consistent structure for UI use.
frontend/src/lib/storage/safeStorage.ts: Provides safe wrappers for localStorage operations with error handling, array normalization, and update event subscriptions.
frontend/src/lib/storage/storageSchema.t: Runs versioned storage migrations to normalize and update various stored data structures.
frontend/src/lib/storage/supportMessagin: Stores and retrieves support message threads, allowing messages to be added per user.
frontend/src/lib/storage/userIdStorage.t: Assigns and maintains stable numeric user IDs for approved users, ensuring legacy users get IDs.
frontend/src/lib/storage/userProfileStor: Manages profile photo storage for users and admin, including set, get, and removal with update events.
frontend/src/lib/storage/userSharingSett: Loads and saves user sharing settings with defaults and dispatches update events.
frontend/src/lib/storage/workerRatesStor: Loads, saves, and migrates worker rate data, supporting lock state and legacy compatibility.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/state/session/SessionProvid: Provides session context, handles restoring, login/logout, and user profile updates with localStorage and user ID management.
Defines session-related interfaces including Session, LoginResult, UpdateProfileParams, context shape, and user record structures.
frontend/src/state/session/useSession.ts: Custom hook that retrieves the session context and enforces usage within SessionProvider.
frontend/src/utils/moneySplit.ts: Implements consistent per-person money-splitting logic with rounding and fallbacks for legacy data.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration customizing colors, animations, fonts, and container settings with plugin support.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, known issues, and feature requests for navigation updates, logout reinstatement, and UI text fixes.
